duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direction and supervise associates to support a sales driving culture and create a consistent customer experience.
Engage and connect with customers by providing excellent customer service through a hospitality mentality approach.
Offer information to customers on current merchandise assortment, store promotions and events, and execute operational processes effectively and efficiently.
Drive sales by providing an inspiring environment that motivates customers to add to their basket and deliver a consistent sales floor experience.
Build customer connections with a greeting and execute an authentic hospitality experience.
Support sales floor, fitting room, point of sale, and operational processes, as required and ensure all customers feel respected, appreciated, and rewarded.
Leverage omni channel offerings to deliver a frictionless customer experience and build rapport with the customer.
Acknowledge and assist customers through company programs and complete transactions accurately and efficiently while engaging customers.
Train associates to maximize credit and loyalty conversion performance and customer experience.
Oversee daily functions of the Cash Office and onboard, train, and develop associates.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree in Business Administration or related field (Bachelor's preferred)
